page.title: 18WINDMILL HILL FARM
page.content: The farm was built before 1581.It is 4 hundred feet above sea level.Windmill Hill Farm is a funny name for it because there is no sign of a windmill When it was built all the windows were on the north side because people believed the south wind brought the plague.The first family to live at the farm were the Pawsons.They lived there until 1695.The next family were the Allens.They lived there until 1862.The next three families were the Brownlows, the Elliots, and the Rhodes the present family is the Edens.The farmhouse is a protected building.A few years ago they ran a riding school but it was too expensive to run.Now it is a livery stables.They have only got five horses now.In the farmhouse there are some big stone fireplaces.
